name: Mobile Banking App
scope:
Core Features:
1. Account Management
   - Balance checking
   - Transaction history
   - Account statements

2. Payments
   - Domestic transfers
   - International payments
   - Standing orders

3. Security
   - Biometric authentication
   - Transaction signing
   - Fraud detection

4. Additional Services
   - Bill payments
   - Investment overview
   - Customer support chat
cicd_pipeline: Build Pipeline: - Static code analysis - Unit tests - Integration tests - Security scans  Deploy Pipeline: - Automated staging deployment - Production deployment approval - Feature flag management - Automated rollback

delivery_plan.Week 1:
- IoT Hub Setup
- Device registration system
- Real-time data ingestion
- Message routing setup
delivery_plan.Week 2:
- Device Management
- Device provisioning
- Firmware updates
- Health monitoring
delivery_plan.Week 3:
-User Features
- Mobile app development
- Device control interface
- Automation rules engine
delivery_plan.Week 4:
- Analytics
- Real-time analytics
- Energy usage reports
- Predictive maintenance

nfr:
Scalability:
- Support for 100k+ devices
- Message processing < 100ms
- Real-time data streaming

Reliability:
- 99.999% uptime
- Offline device operation
- Automatic recovery

Security:
- End-to-end encryption
- Device authentication
- Regular security audits
